fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Aboard (Day): Give a player a ticket during the day, letting them ride the train. They will be granted invincible defense when aboard.
Eviction (Night): Run over every player who has entered your train even if they are not in tonight, killing them past all and every immunity. Their will is to be cleaned.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You are role-block, re-direct, and control immune.
